Ticket.Summary: Update config.xml to allow for Amazon monitor servers in ACL
Ticket.Description:
We have two Amazon monitor servers with static IPs which need to be able to send requests to ACL protected API endpoints.  This update covers that.

Git Commit:
http://source.dev.company.net/git/?p=dev/env.git;a=commitdiff;h=4f720f1

Prod Roll:
roll prod w x t mgr mtx --import env config.xml --install env config.xml

- Joe

VERSION 7.4.5 BUILD 1
This is an official release of AirCast 7.4.5.  This is build number 1.  New features and changes are listed below.  This release is code and feature complete, and fulfills all the requirements in the ERD.

BUILD SUMMARY
(See the release notes)

NEW FEATURES / CHANGES
This version contains two major bug fixes:

DEPLOYING PLUGIN XML CONFIG FILES WITHOUT RESTART CAUSES OUTAGE
A bug in the Plugin XML configuration code caused a situation we recently ran into on production.  If a Plugin config file is "hot reloaded" (i.e. deployed without a restart) it wipes out the base configuration and uses only what is in the file.  The problem is, we use a hybrid config approach in AirCast, where much of our Plugin configuration is stored in a single "master" configuration file, and only some extra parameters are in external files.  But if a file is hot reloaded, the entire configuration was replaced with only whatever the file provided.  This has been fixed, so the file is now merged back into the base config on reload.

POSSIBLE FILE CORRUPTION IN Hash WITH SIMULTANEOUS WRITES
A possible bug was found in the base Hash filesystem Plugin in AirCast, where local temp files simply did not have enough entropy.  AirCast is using a local temp file to store data just before it gets sent atomically to NFS, and is using only the mediaset hash and item name as the uniqueness.  So if two write requests for the same mediaset and same filename came in at the same exact moment on the same server, this temp file could clobber itself.  This has been fixed so that PID-specific temp subdirectories are used for all local temp files (these dirs already exists and are auto-created/destroyed with each child fork).

BUG FIXES
(See the release notes)

GIT COMMITS
(See the release notes)

DOCUMENTATION
AirCast Release Notes ( http://build.dev.company.net/releases/AirCast/7.4.5/ )

build Build Report ( http://build.dev.company.net/build/?build_report=vqq56w3spg )

AirCast Wiki ( https://confluence.cyan.com/display/DEV/company+AirCast )


REQUIREMENTS
None.

INSTALLATION

Preproduction
sudo roll preprod app mtx --import vqq56w3spg --save b4AirCast_7.4.5 --upgrade

Live Production
sudo roll live-prod app mtx --import vqq56w3spg --save b4AirCast_7.4.5 --upgrade


OPEN ISSUES
None

Copyright (c) 2016 My Company, LLC.  Confidential.
